oracle.mapviewer.share.stylex
Class PieChartStyleModel

java.lang.Object
  oracle.mapviewer.share.style.AbstractStyleModel
      oracle.mapviewer.share.stylex.PieChartStyleModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, StyleModel
public class PieChartStyleModel
extends AbstractStyleModel

Model class for MapViewer pie chart style. A pie chart style can be defined based on a set of attributes from a table. Each pie slice has a color and name defined.

See Also:
Serialized Form
